commits.author: Jacob Bandes-Storch
commits.body: As discussed in #39, adds support for raw strings (Swift 5, SE-0200), supporting all escapes in a single #"...\#n..."# string, and limited support for raw strings with more #s due to grammar limitations.

commits.author: Jacob Bandes-Storch
commits.body: Adds directives such as @available(swift 5), #if compiler(<5), #if canImport(UIKit), and #if targetEnvironment(simulator), and support for UIKitForMac.

commits.author: Jacob Bandes-Storch
commits.summary: Allow _ as label for enum cases (#36)

commits.author: Jacob Bandes-Storch
commits.summary: Simplify lookbehind that was choking Atom and VS Code (#33)

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Match newline escapes in multi-line strings
